replies.author: æ¢¦å°ç™½
replies.txt_content:
# AdvancedBan v2 - Coded by Leoko
# For each setting, there is a small description.
# Please read each description carefully before changing anything.
# For more information visit: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/advancedban.8695/
# Do you want your own Plugin or Website? Check out our Dev-Page: http://dev.skamps.eu

# If set to false all bans will be saved locally in a HSQLDB-Database
UseMySQL: false

# Set to false if you want to have only short messages in the console
# On startup and on the shutdown.
DetailedEnableMessage: true
DetailedDisableMessage: true

# This will be the default reason to be displayed if none is given
DefaultReason: "none"

# Change this if your server has a different time that your users.
# e.g.: ServerTime: 16:43 | Your Time: 13:43 | TimeDiff has to be set to -3
# You can check the server time with /systemPrefs
TimeDiff: 0

# This commands will be disabled for muted players
# A player wouldn't be able to bypass with eg "/minecraft:me"
MuteCommands:
- 'me'
- 'say'
- 'action'
- 'eaction'
- 'describe'
- 'edescribe'
- 'eme'
- 'w'
- 'm'
- 'pm'
- 'whisper'
- 'ewhisper'
- 'emsg'
- 'msg'
- 'etell'
- 'tell'
- 'er'
- 'r'
- 'reply'
- 'ereply'
- 'ac'
- 'eac'
- 'amsg'
- 'eamsg'
- 'ehelpop'

# These players will not be able to get punished in any way
# this also works if the player is offline
ExemptPlayers:
- 'Leoko'
- 'md5'
- 'dutchy1001'
- 'ItzSomebody'

# The date-format which will be used for the %DATE% variable
DateFormat: "dd.MM.yyyy-HH:mm"

# This is useful for bungeecord servers or server with permission systems which do not support *-Perms
# So if you enable this you can use ab.all instead of ab.* or ab.ban.all instead of ab.ban.*
# This does not work with negative permissions! e.g. -ab.all would not block all commands for that user.
EnableAllPermissionNodes: false

# If you use external REST-APIs they will have to respond in JSON
# The given APIs will only be used for NAME -> UUID
# For UUID -> NAME will either use the official MojangAPI or the InternFetcher
# To check if you can use the intern fetcher do /systemPerfs and compare your uuid
#Â  Â to ** you can see online on http://NamesMC.com
#Â  Â if they are similar we recommend using the InternFetcher
UUID-Fetcher:
Â Â # If dynamic it set to true it will override the 'enabled' and 'intern' settings
Â Â # and automatically detect the best possible uuid fetcher settings for your server.
Â Â # Our recommendation: don't set dynamic to false if you don't have any problems.
Â Â Dynamic: true
Â Â Enabled: true
Â Â Intern: false
Â Â REST-API:
Â  Â  URL: "https://api.mojang.com/users/profiles/minecraft/%NAME%?at=%TIMESTAMP%"
Â  Â  Key: "id"
Â Â BackUp-API:
Â  Â  URL: "https://us.mc-api.net/v3/uuid/%NAME%"
Â  Â  Key: "uuid"

# These are the commands that will be performed on warns
# If you skip a number the command from before will be performed
# You can also use non-AdvancedBan-Commands like 'broadcast' or 'clear %PLAYER%
# Variables: %PLAYER%, %REASON%, %COUNT%
WarnActions:
Â Â 3: "kick %PLAYER% &c&oYou have received your 3rd warning!"
Â Â 4: "tempban %PLAYER% 30m &c&oYou have received your 4th warning!"
Â Â 5: "tempban %PLAYER% 5h &c&oYou have received your 5th warning!"
Â Â 6: "tempban %PLAYER% 7d &c&oYou have received your 6th warning!"
Â Â 7: "tempban %PLAYER% 1mo &c&oYou have received your %COUNT%th warning!"
Â Â 10: "ban %PLAYER% &c&oYou have received your 10th warning!"

# Here you can create permission-nodes for max-punishment-duration.
# The permission "ab.tempban.dur.1" would allow the player to ban max. for 600sec = 10min
# The permission "ab.tempwarn.dur.2" would allow the player to warn max. for 3600sec = 1h
# You can only create up to 10 perms. The perms can be overridden with "ab.COMMAND.dur.max"
TempPerms:
Â Â 1: 600
Â Â 2: 3600
Â Â 3: 43200

# With this active will show more information in the console, such as errors, if
# the plugin works correctly is not recommended to activate it since it is 
# designed to find bugs.
Debug: false

# This is the amount of days that we should keep plugin logs in the plugins/AdvancedBan/logs folder.
# By default is set to 10 days.
Log Purge Days: 10
å¤åˆ¶ä»£ç

replies.author: æ¢¦å°ç™½
replies.txt_content:
# The default layouts are in the Message.yml file!

# Message-Layouts can not only be used for bans but also for mutes and warns
# Currently available variables:
#Â  Â %OPERATOR% - The user who dealt the punishment.
#Â  Â %REASON% - Reason for punishment.
#Â  Â %PREFIX% - Prefix set in Message.yml.
#Â  Â %DURATION% - Amount of time left before a punishment expires (will be -1 for permanent punishments).
#Â  Â %DATE% - Date punishment was issued on.
#Â  Â %ID% - Displays the punishment ID (i.e. first punishment = 0, second punishment = 1, third punishment = 2, etc.)
#Â  Â %HEXID% - Displays the punishment ID in base 16. 
# For warns you have also the variable %COUNT% which will be
# replaced with the current amount of warns the player already received
# Example usage: /ban Leoko @ExampleLayout
Message:
Â Â ExampleLayout:
Â  Â  - '&cMengMineCraft Network'
Â  Â  - '&bæ‚¨å› %REASON%'
Â  Â  - "&cè¢«ç®¡ç†å‘˜%OPERATOR%å¤„ç½š"
Â  Â  - "&cracked client please disable it!"
Â  Â  - "&cUnban in &8\xbb &7%DURATION%"
Â  Â  - '&7'
Â  Â  - '&8Unban application in TS or forum'
Â  Â  - "&eTS-Ip &8\xbb &c&ncoming soon"



# You would use this time-layout for example like this: "/tempban Leoko #ExampleLayout Hacking in FFA"
# Or with "/tempwarn Leoko #ExampleLayout Advertising" or even "/tempwarn Leoko #ExampleLayout No capslock please"
# You can also combine this with MessageLayouts like "/tempban Leoko #ExampleLayout @Hacking"
Time:
Â Â ExampleLayout:
Â  Â  - '30m'
Â  Â  - '2h'
Â  Â  - '1d'
Â  Â  - '1w'
Â  Â  - '1mo'
Â  Â  - '2mo'
Â  Â  - '4mo'
Â  Â  - 'perma'
å¤åˆ¶ä»£ç

replies.author: æ¢¦å°ç™½
replies.txt_content:
General:
Â Â Prefix: "&c&lAdvancedBan &8&l\xbb"
Â Â NoPerms: "&cYou don't have perms for that!"
Â Â LayoutNotFound: "&cThere is no layout called %NAME%"
Â Â # This will be the replacement for the %DURATION% variable
Â Â TimeLayoutD: "%D%day(s) %H%h %M%min and %S%sec"
Â Â TimeLayoutH: "%H%hour(s) %M%min and %S%sec"
Â Â TimeLayoutM: "%M%min and %S%sec"
Â Â TimeLayoutS: "%S% seconds"
Â Â FailedFetch: "&cCould not fetch the UUID of %NAME%! See console for details."


Ban:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/ban [Name] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â Done: "&c&o%NAME% &7was successfully banned!"
Â Â AlreadyDone: "&c&o%NAME% &7has already been banned!"
Â Â Exempt: "&7You are not able to ban &c&o%NAME%"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - "&eMengMineCraft Network"
Â Â - "&eæ‚¨å› %REASON%"
Â Â - "&cè¢«ç®¡ç†å‘˜%OPERATOR%å¤„ç½š"
Â Â - "&cBAN ID:&l#%HEXID%"
Â Â - "&cè·ç¦»è§£å°å‰©ä½™è¿˜æœ‰ &b%DURATION%"
Â Â - "&cç”³è¯‰ &6mengxiaobai666@gmail.com &cæˆ– &6help@meng.com"
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got banned by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"

Ipban:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/banip [Name/IP] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - '%PREFIX% &7Permanently banned'
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â - "&cReason &8\xbb &7%REASON%"
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â - '&8Unban application in TS or forum'
Â Â - "&eTS-Ip &8\xbb &c&ncoming soon"
Â Â - "&eForum &8\xbb &c&ncoming soon"
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got banned by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"
Â Â IpNotCashed: "&cThere is no saved IP for %NAME%!"

Tempban:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/tempban [Name] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs/#TimeLayout] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â MaxDuration: "&cYou are not able to ban more than %MAX%sec"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - "æ‚¨çš„è´¦å·å·²è¢«&eMengMineCraft Network&rç®¡ç†ç»„å°ç¦"
Â Â - "&eåŸå› :%REASON%"
Â Â - "&cBAN ID:&l#%HEXID%"
Â Â - "&cè·ç¦»è§£å°å‰©ä½™è¿˜æœ‰ &b%DURATION%"
Â Â - "&cç”³è¯‰ &6mengxiaobai666@gmail.com &cæˆ– &92604877969"
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got banned by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"
Â Â - "&7&oThis player got banned for &e&o%DURATION%"

Tempipban:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/tempipban [Name/IP] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs/#TimeLayout] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â MaxDuration: "&cYou are not able to ban more than %MAX%sec"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - '%PREFIX% &7Temporarily banned'
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â - "&cReason &8\xbb &7%REASON%"
Â Â - "&cDuration &8\xbb &7%DURATION%"
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â - '&8Unban application in TS or forum'
Â Â - "&eTS-Ip &8\xbb &c&ncoming soon"
Â Â - "&eForum &8\xbb &c&ncoming soon"
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got banned by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"
Â Â - "&7&oThis player got banned for &e&o%DURATION%"

Mute:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/mute [Name] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â Done: "&c&o%NAME% &7was successfully muted!"
Â Â AlreadyDone: "&c&o%NAME% &7has already been muted!"
Â Â Exempt: "&7You are not able to mute &c&o%NAME%"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - '%PREFIX% &7You are permanently muted'
Â Â - "&cReason &8\xbb &7%REASON%"
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got muted by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"

Tempmute:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/tempmute [Name] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs/#TimeLayout] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â MaxDuration: "&cYou are not able to mute more than %MAX%sec"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - '%PREFIX% &7You are muted for %DURATION%'
Â Â - "&cReason &8\xbb &7%REASON%"
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got muted by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"
Â Â - "&7&oThis player got muted for &e&o%DURATION%"

Warn:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/warn [Name] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â Done: "&c&o%NAME% &7was successfully warned!"
Â Â Exempt: "&7You are not able to warn &c&o%NAME%"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - '%PREFIX% &cYou received a warning'
Â Â - "&cReason &8\xbb &7%REASON%"
Â Â - '&7You have now &c&o%COUNT% &7warning(s) in total!'
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got warned by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"

Tempwarn:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/tempwarn [Name] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs/#TimeLayout] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â MaxDuration: "&cYou are not able to warn more than %MAX%sec"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - '%PREFIX% &cYou received a temp-warning'
Â Â - "&cReason &8\xbb &7%REASON%"
Â Â - "&cIt will pass in &8\xbb &7%DURATION%"
Â Â - '&7You have now &c&o%COUNT% &7warning(s) in total!'
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got temp-warned by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"
Â Â - "&7This warning will pass in &o%DURATION%"

Kick:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/kick [Name] [Reason/@Layout]"
Â Â Done: "&c&o%NAME% &7was successfully kicked!"
Â Â NotOnline: "&c&o%NAME% &7is not online!"
Â Â Exempt: "&7You are not able to kick &c&o%NAME%"
Â Â Layout:
Â Â - '%PREFIX% &7You got kicked'
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â - "&cReason &8\xbb &7%REASON%"
Â Â - '&7'
Â Â Notification:
Â Â - "&c&o%NAME% &7got kicked by &e&o%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&7For the reason &o%REASON%"


UnBan:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/unban [Name/IP]"
Â Â NotPunished: "&c&o%NAME% is not banned!"
Â Â Done: "&a&o%NAME% &7was successfully unbanned!"

UnMute:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/unmute [Name]"
Â Â NotPunished: "&c&o%NAME% is not muted!"
Â Â Done: "&a&o%NAME% &7was successfully unmuted!"

UnWarn:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/unwarn [ID] or /unwarn clear [Name]"
Â Â NotFound: "&cCould not find warning #%ID%"
Â Â Done: "&7Warn &a&o#%ID% &7was successfully deleted!"
Â Â Clear:
Â  Â  Empty: "&c&o%NAME% &7has no warnings!"
Â  Â  Done: "&7Cleared &a&o%COUNT% &7warnings"

UnPunish:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/unpunish [ID]"
Â Â NotFound: "&cCould not find punishment #%ID%"
Â Â Done: "&7Punishment &a&o#%ID% &7was successfully deleted!"


Banlist:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/banlist <Page>"
Â Â OutOfIndex: "&cThere is no page %PAGE%!"
Â Â NoEntries: "&c&oThere are no entries"
Â Â Header:
Â Â - "%PREFIX% &7Banlist:"
Â Â - "&c&oPlayer/IP &8| &e&oDuration &8| &7&oBanned by"
Â Â - "&c&oType &8> &7&oReason"
Â Â - "&7"
Â Â Entry:
Â Â - "&8[&e%DATE%&8]"
Â Â - "&c%NAME% &8| &e%DURATION% &8| &7%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&c%TYPE% &8> &7&o%REASON%"
Â Â - "&7"
Â Â Footer: "&7Page &e&o%CURRENT_PAGE% &7of &e&o%TOTAL_PAGES% &8| &7Listed bans: &e&o%COUNT%"
Â Â PageFooter: "&7Use &e&o/banlist %NEXT_PAGE% &7to see the next page"

History:
Â Â Usage: "&cUsage &8\xbb &7&o/history [Name/IP] <Page>"
Â Â OutOfIndex: "&cThere is no page %PAGE%!"
Â Â NoEntries: "&c&oCould not find the history of %NAME% :("
Â Â Header:
Â Â - "%PREFIX% &7History for %NAME%:"
Â Â - "&c&oName &8| &e&oDuration &8| &7&oOperator"
Â Â - "&c&oType &8> &7&oReason"
Â Â - "&7"
Â Â Entry:
Â Â - "&8[&e%DATE%&8]"
Â Â - "&c%NAME% &8| &e%DURATION% &8| &7%OPERATOR%"
Â Â - "&c%TYPE% &8> &7&o%REASON%"
Â Â - "&7"
Â Â Footer: "&7Page &e&o%CURRENT_PAGE% &7of &e&o%TOTAL_PAGES% &8| &7Total entries: &e&o%COUNT%"
Â Â PageFooter: "&7Use &e&o/history %NAME% %NEXT_PAGE% &7to see the next page"

Warns:
